<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Raging Athlete](/Feats.aspx?ID=5819) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 78 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

</column>

---

Physical obstacles can't hold back your fury. While you are raging, you gain a climb Speed and swim Speed equal to your land Speed, and the DC of [High Jumps](/Actions.aspx?ID=2377) and [Long Jumps](/Actions.aspx?ID=2378) decreases by 10, and you increase your distance on a successful Long Jump by 10 feet. Your distance for a vertical [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=2298) increases to 5 feet vertically, and your distance for a horizontal Leap increases to 15 feet if your Speed is at least 15 feet, and to 20 feet if your Speed is at least 30 feet.
